The loan will be used to buy merchandise in order to increase stock levels in her store. This will allow her to increase her sales, generate greater income and improve the overall quality of her life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise in order to increase stock levels in her store.

loans.name: Celia

texts.en:
Celia is a hard-working woman entrepreneur with two children.

She has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 21,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional groceries to sell.

She earns additional income through other business ventures such as fattening pigs.

Celia dreams that one day, she will be able to save enough money to continue to send her children to school

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Lorela

texts.en:
Lorela is 44 years old and married with four children, two in school.

Lorela works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell.

Lorela has borrowed and repaid 18 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for six years and also earns income from farming sugarcane.

Lorela aspires to save enough money to continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Gladys Elizabeth

texts.es: A sus 33 años de  edad Gladys esa casada, vive muy feliz junto a su esposo que trabaja de chofer y a sus hijos de 10 y 13 años de edad que asisten a la escuela, Gladys creció en el campo y su actividad económica es la de criar vacas para ordeñarlas y vender la leche. Gladys con el dinero del crédito va a comprar una vaca, Gladys tiene la meta planteada que es la de darles lo mas necesario a sus hijos y sobre todo la educación ya que esta es la mejor herencia que los padres le pueden dejar a sus hijos.
texts.en: At 33 years of age Gladys is married. She lives very happily with her husband who works as a driver and her two children ages 10 and 13 years old who go to school. Gladys grew up in the country and her business is raising cows to milk and selling the milk. With the money from the loan Gladys is going to buy a cow. Gladys has a goal planned to provide everything her children need especially their education given that this is the greatest legacy that parents can give their children.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Francisco Javier

texts.es:
Francisco, es una persona reconocida en su caserío por su honradez, se dedica a trabajar en el campo cultivando granos básicos, sus padres le inculcaron el oficio,  con las cosechas puede tener parte de  la alimentación familiar y también genera ingresos para cubrir otras necesidades del hogar. Vive felizmente con su esposa y dos hijas de 4 y 7 años de edad, la mayor ya asiste a la escuela. 
Con el propósito de mejorar sus cultivos solicita un crédito en Padecomsm para comprar semilla mejorada, abono, insecticidas y plaguicidas para lograr tener una cosecha abundante, espera tener mejores ingresos con los que pueda resarcir su deuda y cumplir con sus obligaciones familiares.
Sueña con mantener la continuidad de su negocio y compartir con su familia un estilo de vida más digno.
texts.en:
Among his neighbors, Francisco is known for being an honorable man.  He learned farming from his parents as a boy and has his own farming business now.  He grows grain crops, part of which goes to feeding his family and the rest to sell for cash for other family expenses.  He is happily married and he and his wife have two daughters, 7- and 4-years old.  His oldest daughter is in school.
Francisco is applying for a Padecomsm loan that he will use to buy seeds, fertilizers and the other supplies he needs to maximize his crop yields.  He expects to earn enough from his next harvest to repay his debt and cover the family's expenses.  
For the future, Francisco, wants to carry on his business and ensure that his family has a decent standard of living.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his farming business.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Don Miguel de 62 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hijo, el se dedica a realizar viajes a las diferentes colonias desde hace varios años, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar el quiere mejorar su vivienda repellando las paredes y cambiando las puertas  pero como no posee de suficiente capital esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de materiales de construcción, puertas y pago de mano de obra para poder tener una vivienda digna.
texts.en:
Miguel, 62, lives in his own house with his son.  He has worked in transportation for a number of years, making trips to the various neighborhoods.  With this work he manages to pay some household expenses.  

Miguel wants to improve his house by plastering the walls and putting in new doors.  However, he doesn't have the money for this project, and so he is requesting a loan to buy construction materials and doors, and to pay for labor.  This way he will be able to have a decent home.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and pay for labor

loans.name: Genoveva

texts.en:
Genovevahas is an enthusiastic farmer. She has grown rice in Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Norte and has yield good earnings. 

She applied a loan to pay for land and seedbed preparation. This will ensure that the rice field is ready for planting and a higher yield will produce  more income.

loans.use: to pay for land and seedbed preparation.

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily is 30 years old and lives in Sta. Cruz, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has a school-aged child. 

Emily raises hogs and earns  3,000 PHP a month. She is requesting 10,000 PHP to buy feed, rice bran, vitamins, and 5 piglets. 

Emily has been a member of PMPC for 3 years and hopes to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy feed, rice bran, vitamins, and 5 piglets.

loans.name: Zeny

texts.en: Zeny is 57 years old, widowed and lives in Lawa-an, Aloran-Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental. She has been in the vegetable retailing business for 30 years. This business has supported her family's needs, especially the education of her children. She signed up for membership with Paglaum MPC and has received various services the cooperative offers to members. Recently, she applied for a loan of PHP 14,900 to purchase more vegetables and spices to sell.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables and spices to sell.

loans.name: Annie Rose

texts.en: Annie Rose is a businesswoman from Calube, Aloran-Oroquieta, Misamis Occidental. She is 25 years old, married and has expertise in selling. She runs a little sari-sari (convenience store) and earns a meager income that sufficiently supports her family. Annie Rose is a full fledged member of PMPC and has taken out several loans already. She maintains her membership in good standing without records of default. Now, she has applied for a loan to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items. Annie Rose continues to look for better business opportunities, proof that she has the passion and the energy to make ends meet for her family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es: Don Manuel es agricultor y necesita un préstamo de ₡ 1 000 000 para la compra de semillas e insumos agrícolas necesarios para el crecimiento y buen desarrollo de sus cultivos, de esta manera podrá incrementar la productividad y aumentar los ingresos provenientes de dicha actividad.
texts.en: Manuel is a farmer and needs a loan of 1,000,000 CRC to buy the seeds and agricultural inputs needed for the growth and healthy development of his crops. In this way he can increase his productivity and increase the income from this work.

loans.use: to buy seeds and agricultural inputs.

loans.name: Sara Maria

texts.es:
Sara es una mujer, que trabaja como enfermera en una clínica de su ciudad, tiene una personalidad muy amorosa, le encanta cuidar de los demás. Fue beneficiada con un préstamo de Kiva junto a MiCrédito, de saneamiento, con el cual mejoro el servicio higiénico de la casa de su madre, para que esta gozara de una mejor higiene y por ende mejor calidad de vida. 
Sara ha vuelto a recurrir a un préstamo de saneamiento de Kiva y MiCrédito, esta vez para arreglar el baño de su casa, cambiar las tuberías e instalar un nuevo inodoro, todo esto para eliminar el mal olor que invade su hogar, por el deterioro del servicio higiénico. Ella está muy agradecida y pretende seguir trabajando con financiamiento que le den la oportunidad de mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Sara works as a nurse in a clinic in her town. She has a very loving personality and adores caring for others. Sara has benefited from a sanitation loan from Kiva MiCrédito which she used to improve the toilet facilities in her mother's bathroom. This allowed her to enjoy a more hygienic environment and hence improve the quality of her life. Sara has come back to Kiva MiCrédito to ask for another sanitation loan, this time to remodel the bathroom in her home, replace the pipework and install a new toilet. She hopes this will eliminate the bad smell caused by the dilapidated toilet system that pervades her home . Sara is extremely grateful and intends to keep working with the  funding provided which has given her the chance to improve the quality of her life.

loans.use: to remodel her bathroom, replace the pipework and instal a new toilet.

loans.name: Sunshine

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Sunshine works hard to support her family.

She has a tricycle passenger business in the Philippines and earns additional income from a retail clothing business. Sunshine is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to buy wheels and spare parts for her tricycle..

Sunshine has been sustaining her business activities through her past seven loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy wheels and spare parts for her tricycle.

loans.name: Carlos Celiano

texts.es: Carlos de 66 años, está dedicado a la prestación de servicios de construcción, luego de salir pensionado de la empresa para la que trabajaba y por su amplia experiencia en esta labor decidió crear su microempresa. Cuenta con seis años de funcionamiento y un excelente posicionamiento en el mercado, él ofrece servicio de acabados, mampostería, diseño y servicio a todo costo.  En la actualidad está tramitando su primer credikiva con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, primer financiamiento que requiere para adquirir una maquinaria.  Su meta a largo plazo es continuar brindando ambientes con mejores condiciones de habitabilidad y novedosos diseños.
texts.en: Carlos, 66 years old, provides construction services; after retiring from the company he worked for, with his extensive experience in the field he decided to open his own small business. He has been in business for six years and has an excellent position in the market, offering finishing services, drywalling, design work and services for all price ranges. Now he is applying for his first kiva loan through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, the first financing he has required, to purchase machinery. His long-term goal is to continue improving homes with better living conditions and new designs.

loans.use: to acquire machinery

loans.name: Zaynura

texts.ru:
Зайнура жизнерадостная и ответственная женщина. Она разведена и имеет двое детей. Вместе со своей семьёй Зайнура живёт в сельской местности. Сама Зайнура работает официанткой в столовой. Она очень любит своих детей, и старается обучать их от всего своего сердца, потому что она желает видеть образованных детей. Но зарплата, которую она получает, недостаточна для покрытия всех имеющихся нужд в семье. 
 В данное время Зайнура хочет отремонтировать дом, где они живут, чтобы улучшить условия для проживания. Но собственных средств у неё недостаточно. Для этого Зайнура обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для ремонта дома. Она надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Zaynura is a joyous and responsible woman. She is divorced and has two children. Zaynura lives with her family in a rural area. Zaynura works as a waitress at a cafe. She really loves her children and tries to teach them wholeheartedly because she wants to see her children get educated well. However, her salary is not enough to cover all of the family's necessities.

At the present time, Zaynura wants to repair the house where they live to improve their living conditions, but does not have enough of her own money to do this. This is why Zaynura came to Arvand to obtain a loan to buy construction materials to repair her house. She hopes for a positive result and thanks Arvand for the support in advance.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to repair her house

loans.name: Candy Jackelin

texts.es:
Candy es una joven estudiante de la carrera de Diseño Industrial, carrera que le gusta mucho por ser muy interesante ya que se basa en estructuras. Siente que va aprender mucho en su carrera y es una de las más demandadas, así podrá ayudar a sus padres que están pasando por una difícil situación económica.
Ya lleva estudiando 2 años y medio, le falta un año para que pueda culminar su carrera. Siente que cada día sus estudios son más difíciles de aprender pero no se rinde, nada es imposible, por eso sigue adelante. Ella piensa trabajar en una empresa en la cual pueda ejercer lo aprendido en su carrera.
Actualmente su situación económica es muy complicada debido a que sus padres son personas de la tercera edad y no cuentan con los recursos económicos para apoyarla en sus estudios, es por ello que recurre al apoyo de KIVA para que cumpla sus sueños de ser una gran profesional y especializarse en su carrera.
La mayor dificultad que presenta ella son los bajos recursos económicos por los que atraviesa su familia, pero aún así ella confía en las organizaciones como KIVA para poder cumplir sus metas.
Candy les quiere decir: "Gracias KIVA por ponerse en nuestro lugar y entender lo difícil que es la situación por la que atraviesan, de verdad, muchisimas gracias!!
texts.en:
Candy's a young student in industrial design, a program she likes a lot.  It's very interesting because it's based on structures.  She thinks she's going to learn a lot.  It's one of the most in-demand programs, so she'll be able to help her parents, who are going through a difficult situation.

She has been studying for two-and-a-half years now and has one more year to finish her program.  She feels that her studies are more difficult all the time.  She doesn't give up, though; nothing is impossible, so she keeps moving forward.  She's planning to work in a company where she can practice what she has learned in her program.

Candy's current financial situation is very complicated because her parents are elderly and don't have the financial resources to support her studies.  That's why she's turning to Kiva for help in realizing her dream of being a great professional and specializing in her field.  Her biggest difficulty is her family's limited financial resources.  Even so, she has faith in organizations like Kiva so she can achieve her goals.

Candy wants to say to you: "Thank you, Kiva, for putting yourselves in our place and understanding how difficult the situation is.  Really, thank you so much!

loans.use: to finish her degree in industrial design at SENATI and to start her own company

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.en: Ernesto has wide experience in farming. He has mastered farming activities from planting, raising and harvesting crops. Ernesto has supported his wife doing this work.  Ernesto has nurtured his membership with PMPC and has maintained a good repayment record. He knows he can always turn to the cooperative for his financial needs. Recently, he applied for a loan to purchase rice seeds for healthier and potentially higher-yielding seedlings.  Someday, Ernesto hopes to purchase more land to cultivate rice and potentially add income for the family.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds for healthier and potentially higher-yielding seedlings

loans.name: Lucita

texts.en: Lucita is 49 years old and lives in Tabo-o, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with five adult children. Lucita has been engaged in a business catching and selling sea urchin for 30 years to help support her husband, who is a fisherman. The couple earns approximately PHP 3,000 per month. She has requested a loan to purchase feed and three piglets for hog raising as her other livelihood activity. Lucita has been a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) for 10 years. In the future, she hopes to expand her hog raising activity.

loans.use: To purchase feed and three piglets

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is a hard-working woman entrepreneur with three children.

She has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell.

She earns additional income through other business ventures such as fattening pigs and selling fruit.

Erlinda dreams that one day she will be able to save money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Santos Enemesio

texts.es:
Santos ha tenido un resultado positivo al invertir el crédito anterior en la granja de pollos y en sus cultivos de granos básicos, sus cosechas han sido abundantes y ha comercializado mayor cantidad de pollos, tiene mejores ingresos y su negocio está creciendo.
Opta por un nuevo crédito para comprar concentrado, fertilizantes y para pagar obreros que le ayuden con los trabajos agrícolas, cuidara que sus animales estén bien alimentados y seguirá cultivando granos básicos, espera seguir progresando y mantener su buena calificación en el uso de créditos.
texts.en: Santos has successfully used past loans to grow and maintain his farming business.  He harvested a record amount of grain and sold more chickens than before, results that increased his income.  He is applying for a new loan to support his growing business.  He will use the loan to pay for animal feed, fertilizer and other supplies, along with the contract labor that he needs to carry on his business.  The investment will ensure that he can properly care for his land and animals and continue growing his business.

loans.use: to pay for the labor and supplies he needs to carry on his farming business.

loans.name: Tièssiri Ton Group

texts.fr:
Niakoro   est celle qui tient la corne du mouton sur la photo, elle fait  l’élevage ovine, âgée de 54 ans, elle habite au Mali, mariée et mère de 7 enfants, ses enfants sont âgés de 7ans  à 20 ans dont(1) un fréquente   l’école, son époux   est cultivateur.
Elle  exerce ce métier il y a de cela plusieurs années, il s‘approvisionne et vend ses animaux aux marchés de sa localité.
Par manque de fonds de roulement, elle sollicite auprès du RMCR un  prêt  pour  acheter des moutons  d’élevage, qui la  serviront à  couvrir les charges familiales: santé, école, nourriture. Ses activités peuvent lui apporté un revenus  de 25000 FCFA après les ventes.
 Niakoro  rêve   d’être automne et être utile à dans sa famille.
texts.en:
Niakoro is the woman holding the sheep by the horns in the photo. She earns a living by raising sheep and she lives in Mali. She is a 54-year-old married mother to seven children aged between seven and 20 years old; one of her children is currently attending school. Her husband works as a farmer.

Niakoro has been working this trade for several years. She purchases and sells her livestock at the local markets. Due to a lack of working capital, she has turned to RMCR for a loan so she can purchase sheep to raise. This will pay for her family's needs: health costs, school fees, food. With this business, she can earn up to 25,000 FCFA after selling her livestock.

Niakoro's dream is to become financially independent and to serve her family.

loans.use: to purchase livestock to raise then resell

loans.name: Lourdes Judith

texts.es:
Lourdes tiene 40 años de edad, es casada, vive con su esposo en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Lourdes se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como pollos, cerdos, patos, pavos, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con 15 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que solicita será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales como gallinas, patos, pavos, pollos, entre otros, así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para estos. Con esto Lourdes espera ofrecer un mejor producto a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir generar mayores ingresos y por ende incrementará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Lourdes is 40 years old, she is married and lives with her husband in a rural area of the Oyotún district, which is in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru. The residents of this district work mainly in agriculture, livestock and commerce.

Lourdes raises and sells small farm animals, such as chickens, pigs, ducks, turkeys, among others; her business is located in her own home. She has 15 years of experience in the business and has very good personal and work references in the area. The loan she is requesting will be used for the purchase of a greater number of animals such as hens, ducks, turkeys, chickens, among others, as well as for the purchase of feed for these. With this Lourdes hopes to offer a better product to her customers, which will allow her to generate more income and thus increase her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: buy a greater number of animals such as hens, ducks, turkeys, chickens, among others, as well as to buy feed for these.

loans.name: Coumba's Group

texts.fr:
Inauguré le 16 Mai 2011, ce banc villageois est composé de femmes du groupement du village qui ont adhéré dans le programme afin de rendre les activités dans le petit commerce plus rentables, elles s’activent également dans l’agriculture sous pluie. Une bonne ambiance anime les rencontres du groupe. 

Madame Coumba, âgée de 29 ans (debout à l’extrême droite avec une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants dont 02 garçons et 01 fille. Elle s’active dans la vente de bananes.

Avec son nouveau prêt, elle compte acheter 150kg de bananes à 200f le kg, payer un transport de 5000f pour le revendre en détails dans son village.

Avec les bénéfices, elle compte améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille (nourriture, habillements, soins médicaux etc.).
texts.en:
Inaugurated on 16th May 2011, this banc villageois is made up of women from the village who have signed up to the group in order to make their small-scale retail businesses profitable. They also earn their livings through rain-based agriculture. There is a positive atmosphere between all group members.

29-year-old Coumba (the woman standing to the far right with her hand raised) is the group's star borrower. She is a married mother to three children; two boys and one girl. She earns a living through selling bananas.

With this new loan, she wants to purchase 150 kg of bananas at 200F per kilo and to pay for transportation costs (5000F) so they can be sold in the village.

With the profits from this loan, she plans to improve her family's living conditions by providing food, clothing, medical care etc...

loans.use: to purchase 150 kg of bananas at 200F per kilo and to pay for transportation costs (5000F) so they can be sold in the village

loans.name: Florencia

texts.en: Florencia came to the right place when she signed up for membership with Paglaum MPC. She has enjoyed various financial assistance, from financing her sari-sari store (convenience store), to her rice production business, and this time for her medical checkup and purchase of maintenance medicines.

loans.use: to pay for a medical check-up and purchase maintenance medicines.

loans.name: Belarmino

texts.es: Don Belarmino se desempeña como constructor. El solicita un préstamo de ₡ 1 000 000 para la compra de material que le permita  terminar de construir un galerón en el cual él pueda preparar parte de las estructuras que utiliza para las construcciones y ofrecer un servicio más oportuno a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Belarmino works as a builder.  

He is applying for a loan of ₡1,000 000 colón in order to buy material which will enable him to finish constructing a shed where he can prepare parts of the structures he uses in his constructions. 

This means he can offer a better service to his clients.

loans.use: to buy materials in order to build a shed

loans.name: Jay Mark

texts.en:
Jay Mark wants to fulfill his dreams by completing a degree. He religiously pays attention to making a good mark for every semester he enters. For another school year, Jay Mark is in need of an amount to pay for his school fees.

Jay Mark has big dreams to help his family and his siblings as well, and that's the reason why he works hard for his education.

loans.use: to pay for his school fees.

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Joan

texts.en:
Joan is a married woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Joan is 34 years old, and three of her children are in school.

Joan has a restaurant business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy additional utensils and ingredients for her restaurant business.

Joan has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy additional utensils and ingredients for her restaurant business.

loans.name: Sandra Dinora

texts.es:
Sandra, de 35 años de edad, se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a la crianza de pollos y gallinas ponedoras, ella creció con sus padres, quienes se dedicaban a la agricultura y a la venta de productos básicos; Sandra, está soltera y no tiene hijos.  

Sandra, tiene 4 años de experiencia en la crianza de pollos y gallinas ponedoras, está actividad la aprendió de sus padres, quienes dedicaron toda su vida a realizar esta actividad y fueron ellos quienes le inculcaron buenas ideas y principios para poder salir adelante, de esta manera obtiene su ingreso, para solventar sus compromisos y satisfacer las necesidades de su familia.
 
El dinero del crédito será destinado para comprar alimento concentrado para las gallinas ponedoras y para comprar más pollos de engorde, de esta manera mejorara sus ingresos económicos.

Los sueños de Sandra son, mejorar las instalaciones y dedicarse también a la crianza de cerdos.
texts.en:
Sandra, 35, is single and has no children.  She operates a business raising and selling chickens.  She had the example of her parents who made their living farming and selling everyday products.  She has operated the business for 4 years and credits her parents with teaching her how to support herself and get ahead in the world.  

Sandra is applying for a loan that she will use to buy more chickens and the feed and other supplies she needs to raise them.  The investment will allow her to carry on her business and support herself.  

For the future, Sandra hopes to improve the space and equipment she uses for her business and to buy and raise pigs.

loans.use: to buy chickens and feed for her poultry business.

loans.name: Elshadai De Silmissin Group

texts.fr: Marthe est âgée de 36 ans mariée mère de 2 enfants scolarisé. Vendeuse depuis 17 ans. Son accueil, le travail bien fait et le bon emplacement sont des atouts pour faire marcher son activité. Elle veut le prêt pour s’acheter de 75 000 de mèches, acheter 25 000 de gommes et pommade, réserver 50 000 pour les autres dépenses pour la coiffure. L’utilité du prêt c’est de s’approvisionner son salon afin de bien faire sa coiffure pour subvenir de besoin et à la scolarisation de ses enfants. Elle à déjà reçue le prêt 5 fois et à rembourser aux dates prévue ce qui fait d’elle une bonne cliente de ACFIME.
texts.en:
Marthe is a 36-year-old married mother to two children who are both currently attending school. She has worked as a vendor for 17 years. Her welcoming demeanour, her insistence to do the job well and the location of her store are all key ingredients to her business' success. She is requesting this loan in order to purchase 75,000-FCFA's worth of hair extensions, 25,000-FCFA's worth of hair gel and 50,000-FCFA's worth of other hair accessories. 

This loan will be used to supply her salon with the necessary materials so that her business does well. by doing this, she can meet her children's needs and pay for them to attend school. She has already received five previous loans and paid them all back on time, making her one of ACFIME's reliable clients.

loans.use: to purchase 75,000-FCFA's worth of hair extensions, 25,000-FCFA's worth of hair gel and 50,000-FCFA's worth of other hair accessories

loans.name: Khady's Group

texts.fr:
Inauguré le 16 Mai 2011, ce banc villageois est composé de femmes du groupement du village qui ont adhéré dans le programme afin de rendre les activités dans le petit commerce plus rentables, elles s’activent également dans l’agriculture sous pluie. Une bonne ambiance anime les rencontres du groupe. 

Madame Khady, âgée de 30 ans (debout à l’extrême droite avec une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est mariée et mère de 05 enfants dont 03 garçons et 02 filles. Elle s’active dans la vente de bananes.

Avec son nouveau prêt, elle compte acheter 150kg de bananes à 200f le kg, payer un transport de 5000f pour le revendre en détails dans son village.

Avec les bénéfices, elle compte faire de l’embouche bovines pour les revendre après et s’occuper de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Launched on the 16th May 2011, this rural bank is composed of women from the village who joined the program in order to improve the profitability of their petty trade activities. They also work in agriculture in the rainy season. A good atmosphere pervades the group meetings. 

Mrs Khady, aged 30 years (standing on the extreme right with her hand raised) is the featured borrower in this group. She is married and the mother of 5 children of which 3 boys and 2 girls. She trades in bananas. With her new loan, she intends to purchase 150kg of bananas at 200f per kg, and pay transportation costs of 5000f in order to resell them retail. With the profits, she intends to make cattle fattener to resell it and take care of her children.

loans.use: to purchase and transport bananas for resale in her village

loans.name: Olga Lidia

texts.es: Doña Olga se dedica a la venta de artículos de limpieza para uso doméstico. Ella solicita un préstamo de ₡ 1 000 000 para  ofrecer más cantidad y variedad de productos, por medio de este préstamo ella podrá continuar y expandir su propio negocio.
texts.en: Doña Olga works selling cleaning articles for domestic use. She is requesting a loan of ₡1.000.000 [$1,900] in order to offer a greater quantity and variety of products. By means of this loan she will be able to continue and expand her own business.

loans.use: to purchase cleaning articles to sell.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 55 years old, married, has four children of adult age and lives in Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur. She manages a clothing shop where she gains income that sufficiently supports the needs of her family. She signed up for membership in Paglaum MPC where she availed a loan for additional capital for expansion of her business.
Evelyn employs her jobless neighbors in her business. Currently, she has requested another loan of 14,900 PHP to buy bundles of clothes for resale. She hopes for more success in her business and wishes to buy an additional truck so that she can display her products to neighboring towns and cities.

loans.use: to buy bundles of clothes for resale

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Ada Del Carmen

texts.es:
Ada, de 26 años de edad, es una persona muy dedicada al comercio, ha logrado mejorar su negocio gracias al primer financiamiento que le otorgo Credicampo; está acompañada y su pareja se dedica a la agricultura, estudio hasta bachillerato, luego estudio un curso de cosmetología, que le sirvió para ofrecer estos servicios desde su casa.

Ada, tiene 5 años de experiencia en ventas, porque después de terminar sus estudios, trabajó en una tienda en su municipio y gracias a esa experiencia a colocado su propia tienda y también se dedica a maquillar y a realizar peinados, mientras que su pareja siembra granos básicos.- De esa manera, se gana el dinero para satisfacer las necesidades de su hogar y cumplir con sus obligaciones. 

El dinero será utilizado para mejorar y ampliar su tienda con más productos como arroz, aceite, pan, detergentes, entre otros; porque se acercan las fiestas patronales de la comunidad y es una buena temporada para las ventas.

Las metas que tiene a futuro son, tener una tienda grande y surtida, establecer un bazar y un negocio de productos de cosmetología.
texts.en:
Ada is 26 years old.  She is very dedicated to her business.  She has managed to improve her business thanks to the first loan she obtained through Credicampo.  She lives with her partner who works in agriculture.  She studied through high school and later took a cosmetology course, which allowed her to offer cosmetology services from her house.

Ada has 5 years experience in sales.  After finishing school she worked in a store in her town.  That experience allowed her to open her own store.  She also works as a makeup artist and hair stylist.  Her partner grows basic grains.  Through their efforts they make enough money to supply the needs of their home and meet their obligations. 

The money she seeks will be used to improve and expand her store with more products such as rice, oil, bread and detergents, among other things.  The patron saint festivities of the community are approaching, which is a good season for sales.

Her future goals are to to have a big, well stocked store, and to establish a general store and a cosmetic supply business.

loans.use: to improve and expand her store with more products such as rice, oil, bread and detergents, among other things.

loans.name: Maveth

texts.en:
Maveth is 28 years old and lives in Cagay-anon, Sinacaban, Misamis Occidental. She is single with one child who is now of school age. Maveth earns income from her new line of business which is a sari-sari (convenience) store. She’s been engaged in this business for several months already.

Maveth is also receiving support from her live-in partner who is a motorcycle driver. She earns approximately PHP 1,500 each month doing her business activity and that amount is very helpful to support their needs.

Maveth has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional stocks of groceries and consumable products for retail. Maveth has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, she hopes to expand her new sari-sari store business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of groceries and consumable products.

loans.name: Rea

texts.en:
Rea is 28 years old, single, and lives in Toril, Panalsalan, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She is a fishing boat operator in their place and that gives her a monthly income that sufficiently supports her family. Rea is living with her parents, and she wants to give them the best life while they are still living.

Rea learned about Paglaum MPC and the financial services it offers to business enthusiasts like her. She accessed various loan products and has successfully repaid loans without record of default.

Recently, Rea accessed a loan of PHP 4,000 to purchase fishing materials like fishing nets and others. She's looking forward to a good catch so that she can maintain her good record and continuously employ her neighbors.

loans.use: to purchase fishing materials like fishing nets and others

loans.name: Edwin Jose

texts.es:
Edwin, es un hombre de cincuenta y dos años de edad, honesto y trabajador. Que lucha día a día para sacar adelante su pulpería. Poco a poco ha logrado abastecerse de productos que demandaban su clientela, ha crecido notablemente y tambien ha mejorado su calidad de vida. 
En estos momentos, ha recurrido a la ayuda de Kiva junto a MiCrédito, para invertir en la compra de granos básicos, como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, cereales, entre otros y comprar carnes, con esto podrá diversificar los productos que oferta. En un futuro se ve siendo dueño de una distribuidora importante en su ciudad.
texts.en:
Edwin, 52, is an honest, hard-working man.  He struggles every day to maintain his small corner grocery but has managed, slowly, to build a business that provides the everyday products that his customers most want.  His efforts have seen the business grow and provided him with a better quality of life.
Edwin is applying to MiCrédito for another Kiva loan that he will use to stock his business with the merchandise that he sells: rice, beans, sugar and newer products that will help him to attract more customers.  For the future, he sees himself as owner of a larger wholesale business.

loans.use: to stock his grocery business.

loans.name: Pengwende Group

texts.fr: Rahamatou est âgée de 38 ans mariée mère de 4 enfants. Vendeuse de pagne depuis 8 ans. Elle acheté en gros, elle va également vers les clients pour proposer ses produits surtout dans les zones reculées. Son dynamise, son accueille et son amour du commerce est un atout pour réussir son activité. Elle veut le prêt pour s’acheter des pagnes uniwax à 175 000, GTP (Ghana) 25 000 et le reste autre pagnes c’est-à-dire pour 25 000. L’utilité du prêt c’est  pouvoir s’approvisionner pour vendre et avoir un bénéfice. Elle a déjà reçu le prêt plusieurs fois et à rembourser aux dates prévues, elle est une bonne cliente à ACFIME.
texts.en: Rahamatou is 38 years old, married, and has 4 children. She has sold loincloths for 8 years. She buys in bulk, and she also travels to clients in remote areas to sell her products. Her energy, her warmth, and her love for business are advantages for the success of her business. She will use the loan to buy uniwax loincloths for 175,000, GTP (Ghana) loincloths for 25,000, and other loincloths for 25,000. The loan will be utilized to acquire merchandise to sell and earn a profit. She has already received several loans and has repaid them within the deadline. She is a good ACFIME client.

loans.use: to buy uniwax loincloths for 175,000f, GTP (Ghana) brands for 25,000f, and other brands for 25,000f.

loans.name: Zarifmo

texts.ru: Зарифмо замужняя женщина из города Курган-Тюбе. Ей 39 лет и она замечательная мать для своих детей. Растениеводство играет очень важную роль в жизни Зарифмо. Чтобы вырастить хлеб, надо любить, прежде всего, родную землю, отдавать ей частичку своей души. А ещё в совершенстве владеть техникой, повышать свое мастерство – говорит Зарифмо. Она очень хорошо владеет всеми этими качествами. Она выращивает пшеницу и разные овощи. Её муж помогает ей в этом деле. Цель обращения за кредитом в том, что Зарифмо срочно нужно купить минеральные удобрения для земли, где она посадила уже урожай. К сожалению, у неё нет достаточных денег. Зарифмо очень нуждается в Вашей поддержке и верит в Ваше великодушие.
texts.en: Zarifmo is a married woman from the town of Qurgan-Tube. She is 39 years old and is a remarkable mother to her children. Agriculture plays a big part in Zarifmo's life. To grow bread, it is first of all necessary to love the native land and give a piece of your soul to it. And it is also necessary to be proficient in technology and increase your skills, as Zarifmo says. She possesses all of these qualities. She grows wheat and various vegetables. Her husband helps her with this business. Zarifmo needs this loan because she has to urgently buy mineral fertilizers for the land, where she planted the crops. Unfortunately, she does not have enough money. Zarifmo really needs Your support and trusts in Your magnanimity.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Binta's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe  a été crée depuis le 27/05/2013 et il est composé de femmes issues du même quartier unies par de bonnes relations sociales et professionnelles.
Madame Binta est la responsable elle mariée âgée de 62 et mère d'un garçon âgé de 45 ans.
Elle s'active dans le commerce par la vente de produits divers destiné à la consommation.Elle s'active également dans la vente de légumes au niveau du marché de sa localité.
Les bénéfices réalisés par son activité lui permettent de prendre en charge les besoins primaires de sa famille et de renforcer ses épargnes au niveau du banc villageois.
texts.en:
This group was formed since the 27th of May 2013 and is composed of women from the same neighbourhood who have good social and professional ties. 
Mrs Binta is the group leader, she is married, 62 years old and mother of a 45 year old son. She works in trade, selling various products for consumption. She also sells vegetables in her local market. The income from her activity will enable her to take care of her family's primary needs and to consolidate her savings in the rural bank.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise and vegetables

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials & supplies for house improvements.

loans.name: María De Los Angeles

texts.es: María de los Angeles necesita un préstamo de ₡ 600 000 para la compra de materiales de construcción para realizar las reparaciones necesarias en su vivienda, por medio de la obtención de este dinero ella podrá mejorar la seguridad de su familia y vivir en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
María de los Angeles needs a ₡600,000 loan in order to purchase construction materials to complete necessary repairs in her home. 

Through this acquisition of this money she will be able to improve her family's security and living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase home improvement materials.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en: Gina is 48 years old, widowed and has four children of adult age. She lives in Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur. She is a pensioner, member of Paglaum MPC and a microfinance member for almost five years. She maintains her membership in good standing because she knows she can always turn to the cooperative whenever she needs financial assistance. Recently, Gina requested a loan of 30,000 PHP to pay for a medical check-up and to purchase maintenance medicines.

loans.use: to pay for a medical check-up and purchase maintenance medicines.

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Isabel

texts.en:
Isabel finds pleasure in doing her gardening activities. Not only that she is doing her hobby, she earns an income as well. At the age of 73 and married, she busies herself to sufficiently provide for the family.

Isabel grabbed the opportunity to become a full-fledged member of PMPC. She credits the cooperative with her capital in support of her gardening activities. Recently, she applied a loan to purchase gardening tools and fertilizers.

In the future, Isabel wishes to become the supplier of vegetables in the neighboring towns.

loans.use: to purchase gardening tools and fertilizers

loans.name: Lorena Piedad

texts.es:
LORENA TIENE 42 AÑOS DE EDAD, SOLTERA, VIVE CON SU MENOR HIJA, EN CASA PROPIA, EN UNA COMUNIDAD GRANDE EN LA ZONA URBANA DE ZAÑA, PROVINCIA DE CHICLAYO, REGION LAMBAYEQUE, COSTA NORTE DE PERU.

LORENA SE DEDICA A LA ACTIVIDAD DE VENTA DE ABARROTES EN GENERAL, DESDE HACE MÁS DE 2 AÑOS DE ANTIGUEDAD EN EL NEGOCIO, EN SU PROPIO DOMICILIO Y GOZA CON BUENAS REFERENCIAS PERSONALES Y LABORALES DE PARTE DE SUS VECINOS. SOLICITA PRESTAMO PARA LA COMPRA DE MERCADERIA COMO ALIMENTOS, UTILES DE ASEO, ENVASADOS, ENTRE OTROS; PARA SURTIR MÁS SU NEGOCIO. DE ESTA MANERA HACER CRECER MAS SU NEGOCIO,OBTENER MÁS INGRESOS Y PODER MEJORAR SU CALIDAD DE VIDA.
texts.en:
Lorena is 42 years old, single, and lives with her daughter, who is a minor. She lives in her own home in a large community in the urban area of Zaña in the province of Chiclayo, in the region of Lambayeque, in the northern coast of Peru. 

Lorena works selling groceries in general. For more than two years, she has had this business in her own home and has good personal and professional references from her neighbors. She is asking for a loan to purchase merchandise such as food products, toiletries and packaged goods, among others, in order to better stock her business.  In this way, she hopes to grow her business, obtain greater profits and be able to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as food products, toiletries and packaged goods, among others, in order to better stock her business.

loans.name: Jeanna

texts.en:
Jeanna is a hardworking female entrepreneur with five children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. She is now borrowing 15,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy feed and vaccines for her pigs.

She supplements this income with earnings from her general store business.

Jeanna dreams that one day she will be able to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Aichurok

texts.ru: Айчурок успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. У Айчурок в хозяйстве на сегодняшний день есть 10 коров, 20 овец и 2 лошади. На 2,0 Га земли она выращивает люцерну. Айчурок вновь обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для откорма, что позволит улучшить благосостояние семьи. Развитие хозяйства позволит увеличить тем самым ее прибыль. Доходы от кредита Айчурок направит на достойное высшее образование ее детей.
texts.en: Aichurok successfully repaid her loan after using it as intended. She is grateful to the Kiva fund and everyone who had helped her with the financing. Aichurok's farm currently has 10 cows, 20 sheep and 2 horses. She grows alfalfa on 2.0 hectares of land. Aichurok comes to the Bai-Tushum Bank once again to request a loan in the amount of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock for fattening up, which will allow her to improve her family's welfare. Development of her business in turn will result in increased profit. Aichurok will use the earnings from the loan to provide a decent higher education for her children.

loans.use: to buy livestock for fattening up and increase her income

loans.name: Lalaoarisoa Odette

texts.fr:
Odette a 40 ans, elle est mariée et son mari est cultivateur. Ils ont neuf enfants âgés entre 2 et 16 ans dont les quatre premiers sont scolarisés tandis que les autres pas encore. 
Odette est marchande de légumes, surtout les produits agricoles de son mari et elle a commencé cette activité depuis 1995. Elle voudrait développer son activité pour pouvoir améliorer le revenu de la famille ainsi que le niveau de vie de la famille. Et le prêt va lui permettre de donner un coup de pouce pour y parvenir petit à petit.
Selon ses dires le partenariat avec CEFOR lui a permis d'avancer, car grâce aux épargnes et des efforts personnels, elle est en cours de construire sa propre maison, a la possibilité de scolariser ses enfants dans des écoles privées. Son rêve est de pouvoir continuer à financer les études de ses 9 enfants jusqu' au plus haut.
texts.en:
Odette is 40 years old, and married to a farmer. They have nine children between the ages of 2 and 16. The four oldest children are in school, while the rest are not yet in school.
Odette is a vegetable seller, primarily selling agricultural products from her husband. She started her business in 1995. She would like to develop her business to be able to increase the family income and improve the standard of living for her family. The loan will give her a little help to achieve her goals bit by bit.
According to her, her partnership with CEFOR has helped her make progress, since she is in the process of building her own house thanks to savings and personal efforts. She also has the possibility to send her children to private school. Her dream is to be able to continue to finance the studies of her 9 children to the highest level.

loans.use: to buy 6 kinds of carrots, 3 boxes of tomatoes, 30kg of onions, and 500kg of potatoes.

loans.name: Zharkynai

texts.ru: Жаркынай, 32 года, замужем, 3 детей, младший сын в этом году пойдет в первый класс. У нее среднее образование, уже 15 лет она занимается сельским хозяйством. Главной ценностью жизни Жаркынай считает благополучие своей семьи, процветание бизнеса и счастье детей. Благодаря целеустремленности, трудолюбию и нацеленности на результат, на сегодняшний день у Жаркынай в хозяйстве есть 2,0 Га арендованной земли, где выращивает перец, клевер для реализации. Жаркынай обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сомов (KGS) для покупки скота, часть средств она направит на полеводство. Жаркынай намерена увеличить свой бизнес, что приведет к развитию ее деятельности и завершение строительства жилого дома.
texts.en: Zharkynai is 32 years old, married and has 3 children, the youngest of whom will start first grade this year. She has a secondary education and has been involved in agriculture for 15 years. Zharkynai's main treasure in life is her family's welfare, business success and her children's happiness. Thanks to her drive, hard work and determination, today Zharkynai has 2.0 hectares of land, where she grows peppers and clover for sale. Zharkynai requested a loan in the amount of 30,000 som (KGS) from the Bai-Tushum Bank to buy livestock and invest in farming. Zharkynai intends to grow her business, which will lead to further development of her business and completion of home construction.

loans.use: to buy livestock and invest in farming

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
Victor tiene 38 años de edad, vive con su conyugue y sus dos hijos en una zona rural del distrito de Cayaltí que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Victor se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como carneros, chivos entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio.Además se dedica a dar servicios de transporte público ( mototaxi). Cuenta años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que solicita será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para éstos y hacer algunos arreglos en su mototaxi. Con esto Victor espera ofrecer un mejor producto a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir generar mayores ingresos y por ende incrementará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Victor is 38 years old; he lives with his partner and their two children in a rural area of the district of Cayaltí, which is located in Chiclayo Province, Lambayeque Region, on Peru's northern coast. The people who live in this district work mainly in farming, livestock, and trade.

Victor raises and sells small animals, such as rams, goats, and others; his business is located in his own home. He also offers public transportation services (mototaxi). He has years of experience in the business and very good personal and professional references in the area. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy a larger quantity of animals, as well as to buy feed for them, and to make some repairs to his mototaxi. With this, Victor hopes to offer his customers a better product, which will allow him to generate more income and thereby improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of animals, as well as to buy feed for them, and to make some repairs to his mototaxi

loans.name: Mila

texts.en:
Mila is 71 years old, a widow, and lives in Southern Looc, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She has been a full-fledged member of Paglaum MPC for more than 20 years. Mila manages her good membership without records of delayed payments.

Recently, she has accessed a loan of PHP 10,000 to pay for a medical check-up and the purchase of maintenance medicines.

loans.use: to pay for a medical check-up and the purchase of maintenance medicines.

loans.name: Andres

texts.en:
Andres is 63 years old. He is known in Matco Panalsalan, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental for his fishing business. He is actively participating in the various programs and services that the coop offers. He hopes to live comfortably, with a decent house, for which he applied for a loan to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks.

Andres hopes to maintain his membership in good standing, with a good repayment record. It matters that he has been given priority, as a microfinance member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC). This is what he is thankful for, when all his financing needs of his fishing business are supported by PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks for his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy geese and feed.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
As a way of generating income, Carmelita has been engaged in the umbrella business within her community for years now. She is 75 years of age and is married to Miguel with whom she works hand-in-hand to provide for their needs. She offers her items at a low-cost price, which attracts many people.

Due to financial insufficiency, Carmelita wants to make her business more profitable in order to earn a higher income. For this reason, she would like to request a loan amounting to 8,000 PHP (Philippine pesos) to buy additional merchandise and other materials that would help improve her business. Being a kind and friendly mother, she is hoping that she will further improve the business through this financial assistance.

Carmelita dreams for her business to grow bigger and prays to have more chance to serve the Lord in ministries.

She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to buy additional merchandise and other materials to help improve her umbrella business.

loans.name: Exequias

texts.es: Exequias de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia  con su esposa y su hijo, el posee un taller de carpintería en el cual fabrica y vende variedad de muebles, tiene 10 años de dedicarse al negocio, muchas personas lo prefieren ya que él ofrece calidad y buenos precios en sus muebles, el cliente está solicitando un crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de madera, clavos, pega, barniz, junco y de más artículos que logren atraer a más clientes de tal forma que pueda logra su objetivo de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Exequias, age 37, lives in his own house with his wife and son. He has a carpentry workshop in which he makes and sells a variety of furniture. He has been in this business for ten years, and many people prefer him because he offers quality and good prices on his furniture.  

He is requesting a loan with INTEGRAL in order to invest in his business with the purchase of wood, nails, glue, varnish, cane, and other articles, so that he may attract more clients. In this way, he can achieve his objective of improving his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase wood, nails, glue, varnish, cane, and other articles.

loans.name: Mil John

texts.en:
Mil John is 22 years old, single, and lives in Southern Looc, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. At this young age, he is engaged in businesses such as curtain sales, gown rentals, and fishing boat operations that give him an approximate income of PHP 5,000 per month. He is enthusiastic in venturing into business because he wants to give the best life to his parents.

Mil John has signed up for membership with Paglaum MPC and accessed a loan to finance his fishing boat operation. Recently, he accessed a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase materials for fishing boat-making. This additional fishing boat will increase his monthly income.

loans.use: to purchase materials for fishing boat-making.

loans.name: Nel

texts.en:
Nel has been a fisherman for 20 years. He learnt to catch fish from his father. Nel is 39 years old, single and lives in Southern Looc, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental.

His fishing activities give him a good income of approximately PHP 6,000 per month. He learned about Paglaum MPC and the financial services it extends, even to fishermen like him, and he signed up for membership. He has had previous loans which he successfully repaid without records of defaults. Currently, he is requesting a loan of PHP 7,000 to purchase a new fishing boat engine for his fishing activities.

loans.use: to purchase a new fishing boat engine for his fishing activities.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to attend a technical university in food and beverages.

loans.name: San Isidro Group

texts.es:
El comité San Isidro se encuentra en el octavo ciclo, son mujeres muy trabajadoras que se están esforzando para  poder ayudar a sus seres queridos por medio del trabajo en equipo y también con las capacitaciones de la fundación paraguaya.
Cada una de las integrantes pone lo mejor de sí para poder ir mejorando poco a poco, pero entre ellas se destaca principalmente la Sra. Milda, quien tiene una mercería,  donde ofrece todo tipo de productos a sus clientes, como prendas, calzados, artículos de bazar y otros, comenta que gracias a que tiene todo tipo de productos ya se pudo hacer de muy buena clientela que siempre compran de ella.
Hoy Milda pide este préstamo para poder surtir su negocio con todo tipo de productos, como ser calzados, prendas, y otros productos, y de esa forma poder continuar con su negocio y cumpliendo con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
The San Isidro communal bank is in its eighth season. They are very hard-working women who are struggling to help their loved ones by working together and from training with the Fundación Paraguaya.

Each member does her best to improve little by little, but among them Milda stands out. She has a notions store where she offers all types of products to her customers such as clothing, shoes, bazaar items and other things. She mentions that since she has all types of products, she already has a good customer base that always buys from her.

Now, Milda is requesting a loan to stock her store with all types of products, such as shoes, clothing, and other items. This way she can continue with her business and meet the demand of her customers.

loans.use: to buy shoes, clothing, and other products.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy drinks, food, candy and other things.

loans.name: Grezelda

texts.en:
Grezelda is 36 years old and married with 2 children of school age. She is a resident of Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur. She manages a fish selling business where she has a daily income of PHP 4,500.

Grezelda works hard for her business because she wants to send her 2 children to school and have a good life. She needs more capital for expansion that's why she sign up for membership with Paglaum MPC. She nurtured her membership and has repaid all her loans without records of default payments. Recently, she requested a loan of PHP 50,000 to purchase larger volumes of fish for sale.

Someday, she wants to build a comfortable and decent home for her family.

loans.use: to purchase larger volumes of fish for sale.

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Dovie

texts.en:
Dovie is 43 years old and married with three children.

Dovie works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, coffee, bread and personal care products.

Dovie has borrowed and repaid 7 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 6 years and also earns an income from an internet cafe.

Dovie aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, coffee, bread and personal care products.

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is 47 years old and lives in Guintomoyan, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has five children who are now in their teens and school-aged. For her source of income, she has been engaged in hog raising activities for 2 years already. At present, she is an elected barangay official.

Edna earns approximately PHP 5,000 each month from her business activities. She has requested a loan to purchase 5 sacks of booster feed for her business. Edna has been a member of PMPC for four years. In the future, Edna hopes to expand her hog raising business by establishing an additional pig pen at her house.

loans.use: to purchase 5 sacks of booster feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Cresta

texts.en:
Cresta is 32 years old from Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur. She has 2 children of school age and is supported by her husband working abroad.

Cresta wanted to augment their family income so she ventured into an eatery business since she has a passion for cooking. She signed up for membership with Paglaum MPC and obtained the needed capital for her business. Cresta successfully repaid her loan with no records of default. Recently, she asked for another loan of PHP 40,000 to expand her business. The amount she is borrowing from the cooperative will be used to purchase kitchen utensils like spoons, forks, food keepers, ladles and others items for her eatery business.

loans.use: to purchase kitchen utensils like spoons, forks, food keepers, ladles and other items for her eatery business.

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to finish her university studies in business administration.

loans.name: Dolly

texts.es:
La Sra. Dolly de 32 años de edad, es madre soltera con dos hijos, es de la ciudad de Itá, es una mujer muy sacrificada, ya que sola saca adelante a sus hijos.
 Ella se dedica a la venta de comidas por la zona de su barrio, ella misma hace las comidas y después sale a vender de manera ambulante, sus comidas son muy ricas y ya tiene muy buena clientela gracias a su trabajo.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos para poder hacer sus comidas, como ser carnes, verduras, condimentos, hortalizas y otros. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder mejorar cada día.
texts.en:
Señora Dolly, 32, is a single mother with two children. She is from the city of Itá. She is a very selfless woman since she alone provides for her children. 

She sells food around her neighborhood. She makes the meals herself and then goes out to sell them as a street vendor. Her meals are very delicious and she already has a very good clientele thanks to her work. 

She is requesting this loan to be able to invest in the purchase of supplies to be able to make her food, like meat, vegetables, condiments, garden vegetables and others. 

She is grateful for the opportunity she is receiving to be able to improve each day.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables, condiments, garden vegetables and more.

loans.name: Guillermina

texts.es:
La Sra. Guillermina vive en la ciudad de Itá, está en pareja, y comenta que ambos se dedican a la venta de polietileno e insumos farmacéuticos en las compañías de la misma ciudad.
Son una pareja muy trabajadora, que con su esfuerzo se ayudan para poder salir adelante e ir cubriendo las necesidades de la familia.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de polietilenos e insumos farmacéuticos para poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo y cumplir con las demandas de sus clientes.
texts.en: Guillermina lives in the city of Ita, is in a relationship, and states that both of them make a living selling polyethylene and pharmaceutical supplies to companies in the same city. They're a very hard-working couple that has managed to make ends meet and cover their family's needs through their efforts. She's applying for this loan to purchase polyethylene and pharmaceutical supplies to be able to continue selling like they have been and meet their customers' demand.

loans.use: To purchase polyethylene and pharmaceutical supplies.

loans.name: Ramiriza Group

texts.fr:
Audace  fait partie du groupe  Ramiriza et  habite à Gitega. Il  a 37 ans et est marié à Médiatrice, une commerçante. Ensemble ils ont 4 enfants âgés de 3 a 10 ans, dont 3  étudient. 

Il fait le commerce des  choux et tomates  depuis 15 ans. 

Il est à son quatrième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il va  augmenter son capital et acheter beaucoup  beaucoup de choux et de tomates    à revendre  pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle  voudrait avoir une boutique  et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Audace is a member of the group called Ramiriza and lives in Gitega. He is 37 years old and is married to Médiatrice, a small-scale retailer. Together they have four children aged between three and 10 years, of whom three are enrolled in school.

Audace has been selling cabbages and tomatoes for 15 years. He is on his fourth loan with Turame. With the Kiva loan he is requesting, he is going to grow his working capital and buy a lot of cabbages and tomatoes to resell, so as to earn more. In the years to come, he would like to have a shop and see his children study.

loans.use: to grow his working capital and buy a lot of cabbages and tomatoes for resale, so as to earn more.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pursue a master's degree in business administration.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase beverages to sell.

loans.name: Zelena

texts.es:
Zelena es una trabajadora y humilde al igual que toda su familia, gana el pan de cada día vendiendo chipas, y también cosméticos y ropas, ella está estudiando la carrera de ciencias en la educación, y por medio de su carrera quiere poder ayudar a las demás personas.
Ella es una mujer muy luchadora y sacrificada. Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la carrera y también sus derechos a exámenes.
texts.en: Zelena is a hard worker and humble just like the rest of her family, and she makes a living by selling pastries as well as cosmetics and clothing. She's working towards a degree in Education, which she wants to use to help other people. She's a hardworking and selfless woman, and she's applying for this loan to be able to pay for her tuition and her exam fees as well.

loans.use: To pay for tuition and exam fees.

loans.name: Emidio

texts.es:
Emidio estudia para poder ser un buen profesional y por medio de sus estudios poder abrirse camino, es de la ciudad de Encarnación, y está estudiando la carrera de contabilidad.
Sueña con poder abrir su propio negocio y con sus conocimientos poder dirigirlo. Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de estudio y seguir con su carrera.
texts.en:
Emidio is studying to be a good professional and by means of his studies, to be able to open the road [to advancement].  He is from the city of Encarnacion and is studying in the field of accounting.

Emidio dreams of oneday opening his own business and with his acquired knowledge, being able to direct the business. He is requesting this loan so that he can pay his university fees and continue pursuing his career.

loans.use: pay his university fees.

loans.name: Rocio

texts.es:
Rocio es de una familia humilde y muy unida con valores y principios, vive en la ciudad de Caaguazú y comenta que estudia para poder ser una buena contadora que ayude a las demás personas.
Ella pone su mayor esfuerzo para poder lograr su meta de ser un profesional. Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la carrera y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Rocio is from a humble and very united family with values and principles. She lives in the city of Caaguazú and tells us that she is studying in order to be a 
good accountant that can help other people.

She is making her best effort to realise her goal of being a professional. She is asking for this loan in order to pay her university fees and so be able to continue her studies.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: Tugirijambo Group

texts.fr:
Jeanne fait partie du groupe  Tugirijambo  et  habite à Tugirijambo. Elle  a 35 ans et est marié à Paul, un commerçant . Ensemble ils ont 7enfants âgés de 2 à 17 ans, dont 4 étudient. 
Elle a sou sa charge un enfant adoptif.

Elle fait le commerce des habits  depuis 15 ans. 

Elle est à son quatrième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle va  augmenter son capital et acheter beaucoup d’habits   à revendre  pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle  voudrait acheter un terrain pour la pratique de l’agriculture et de l’élevage.
texts.en:
Jeanne is a member of the group Tugirijambo and lives in Tugirijambo. She is 35 years old and is married to Paul, a businessman. They have 7 children together, ages 2 to 17 years old, four of which are in school. She also has an adoptive child in her care.

She has been in the clothing business for 15 years.

She is on her fourth loan at Turame. With the KIVA loan that she receives, she is going to increase her capital and buy a lot of cloths for resale to earn more.

In the coming years, she would like to buy a plot of land for farming and raising livestock.

loans.use: to increase her capital and to buy cloths for resale to earn more.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en:
Rosa is 63 years old,  and is a widow from Buena Voluntad, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She is a full-fledged member of Paglaum MPC where she enjoys its program and services. She had previous loans that helped her finance her sari-sari store (convenience store) and her rice production business. 

Recently, she sought another loan to pay for a medical check-up and purchase of maintenance medicines.

loans.use: to pay for medical check-up and purchase of maintenance medicines

loans.name: Israel Antonio

texts.es: Don Israel de 54 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol desde hace 24 años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, y con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el cliente está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Israel, 54 years old, lives in his own house with his wife and two children. He has earned his living farming corn and beans for 24 years. He sells his products in different markets that are close to his house. With the earnings he obtains, he is able to manage some house expenses.

The client is asking for a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, pest control, etc., and to better the land shown in the picture in order to continue his work and have a better economic income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, pest control, etc., and to better the land.

loans.name: Gabriela

texts.es:
Gabriela actualmente trabaja y estudia para poder recibir su título y poder progresar en independizarme en el futuro.
Comenta que ya es contadora, pero está ampliando sus conocimientos, es por ello que está estudiando la carrera de administración de empresas.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en: Gabriela is currently working and going to school to earn a degree and be able to make progress towards becoming independent in the future. She states that she's already an accountant, but she's expanding her knowledge and that's why she's studying towards a degree in business administration. She's applying for a loan to be able to pay her tuition, and that way continue with her studies.

loans.use: To pay for her college tuition.

loans.name: Ascencion

texts.es:
Ascención tiene 65 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge en casa propia de material rústico en el distrito de Pomahuaca que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Él se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de arroz, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 10 años y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para realizar un adecuado mantenimiento de su cultivo de arroz así como para la contratación de mano de obra para la época de cosecha. Con esto Ascensión espera ofrecer un arroz de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ascención is 65 years old. He lives with his partner in a privately-owned house built with rustic materials in the Pomahuaca district, which is located in the Jaén province of the Cajamarca region in the north mountains of Peru. Life in this district is tranquil. The habitants work principally in agriculture, commerce and livestock.

Ascensión works in farming, specifically the cultivation of rice. He has 10 years of experience in the trade, in addition to very good personal and work references in the area.

The loan that is given to him will be used to buy manure and fertilizers to accomplish an appropriate maintenance of his rice cultivation as well as to hire field hands for the harvest time. With this, Ascensión hopes to offer better quality rice to his clients, which will have a positive impact on his income level, and in turn will better his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to accomplish an appropriate maintenance of his rice cultivation.

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is 60 years old and married.  She has four children, one of whom is still in school.  Delia works very hard to provide for them.  She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell, like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, coffee, bread and other personal care products.

Delia has been in this business for 10 years.  She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell, like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, coffee, bread and other personal care products

loans.name: Ramon Antonio

texts.es:
Don Ramón, es un hombre de cincuenta y dos años de edad, muy honesto y trabajador, padre de cuatro varones,  los cuales son su principal motor para salir adelante. Él tiene un negocio de creación de accesorios como fajas, bolsos, zapatos y derivados de cuero. 
En estos momentos necesita abastecerse con materiales que usa como materia prima para la elaboración de sus productos, por ejemplo comprar broches de acero, hebillas para fajas y bolsos, selladores para cuero, entre otros. Por eso ha recurrido a un préstamo de Kiva y MiCrédito, deseoso de poder surtirse para hacer crecer su producción. En un futuro pretende abrir un taller de tratamiento de cuero.
texts.en:
Ramón is 52 years old.  He is very honest and hard-working, and the father of four sons, who are his driving force to get ahead. His business is the creation of accessories like belts, bags, shoes, and leather products.

He currently needs to stock up on materials that he uses, like raw material for the production of his products. For example, buying steel clasps, buckles for belts and bags, and leather sealers, among other things. For this reason he has asked for a loan from Kiva and MiCredito, eager to be able to stock up in order to make his production grow. In the future he hopes to open a leather treating workshop.

loans.use: to buy steel clasps, buckles for belts and bags, and leather sealers, among other things.

loans.name: Martina

texts.es:
Martina es estudiante de la carrera de Lic. en Fisioterapia y Kinesiología, curso el 3° año, es de San Ignacio Misiones.
Le inspira poder ayudar a las personas discapacitadas, en especial aquellas que no tienen posibilidad de acceder a atenciones médicas especializadas. Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir las cuotas de su carrera y poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en: Martina is from San Ignacio Misiones, and is in her 3rd year of college, studying towards a degree in Physiotherapy and Kinesthetics. Being able to help disabled people inspires her, especially people that lack access to specialized medical care. She's applying for this loan to be able to cover the cost of paying her tuition so that she can continue her studies.

loans.use: To pay for college tuition.

loans.name: Juan

texts.en: Juan is 54 years old, married and lives in Eastern Poblacion, Lopez Jaena-Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. He is a pastor and at the same time operates a Nursery School. These business ventures give him sufficient income for his family needs. At this time, he is venturing into the manufacturing business where he produces conventional stoves. He is taking a loan of PHP 20,000 to purchase materials for a conventional stove-making business.

loans.use: to purchase materials for conventional stove-making business

location.town: Plaridel-Eastern Pob., Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occide

loans.name: Mirian

texts.es:
Mirian es de la ciudad de Santaní, vive con sus padres, es una persona  honesta y  responsable es muy dedicada al estudio, desea sobresalir por medio de su carrera de contadora.
Su meta es de tener su título y poder trabajar de forma independiente, enseñar en las Universidades así ayudar a los jóvenes para ser alguien en la vida.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y de esa forma poder cumplir con sus metas.
texts.en:
Mirian is from the city of Santani. She lives with her parents, and is an honest and responsible person who's very committed to her studies. She wants to excel through a degree in accounting.

Her goal is to earn a degree to be able to work independently, and teach at universities to help young people be somebody in life. She's applying for this loan to be able to pay the tuition for her degree program and that way be able to achieve her goals.

loans.use: To pay for college tuition.

loans.name: Emmalyn

texts.en:
Emmalyn is 22 years old, single and has one child. Emmalyn is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines.  She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pig.
